episodeTitle: Zenny of the Island of Goats and the Pirate Ship in the Mountains!
episodeTitleJapanese: ヤギの島のゼニィと山の中の海賊船
episodeTitleRomanized: Yagi no shima no Zenii to yama no naka no kaizokusen
description: After fleeing from Marine vessels through a dangerous fog, the Straw Hat Pirates land on an uncharted island inhabited by an elderly man named Zenny and numerous goats. Chopper discovers that Zenny suffers from a serious heart condition with only three days to live, while Zoro finds a mysterious pirate ship hidden in the mountains.

events.title: Marine Chase Begins
events.description: The Straw Hat Pirates are being pursued by several Marine ships led by Chief Petty Officer Minchey. The Marines fire cannonballs at the Going Merry as the crew tries to escape.
events.significance: Sets up the episode's opening conflict and establishes Minchey as the antagonist for the Goat Island Arc.

events.title: Fog Escape Strategy
events.description: Nami notices thick fog appearing ahead and decides to use it to their advantage to escape the Marines. The Marine ships begin crashing into barely visible rocks that appear after entering the fog.
events.significance: Demonstrates Nami's navigational skills and allows the crew to escape temporarily, leading them to discover Goat Island.

events.title: Discovery of Goat Island
events.description: After passing through the thick fog and rocky area, the Straw Hat Pirates spot an uncharted island. The crew is starving and hoping to find food on the island.
events.significance: Introduction of Goat Island, the main setting for this three-episode filler arc.

events.title: Encounter with Young Goat
events.description: The Straw Hats walk up from the shore and spot a young goat. The starving crew immediately sees it as food and tries to hunt it down, but Nami stops them.
events.significance: Introduces the goats that are central to the arc's plot and shows the crew's desperation for food.

events.title: Goat Attack
events.description: A mob of angry full-grown goats suddenly surrounds the Straw Hat Pirates. Chopper attempts to reason with the goats and discovers that someone ordered them to attack.
events.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's ability to communicate with animals and sets up the introduction of Zenny as the person commanding the goats.

events.title: Zenny's First Appearance
events.description: An old man suddenly falls out of a tree, pointing at the now-transformed Chopper and calling him a monster. The crew discovers this is Zenny, the man who ordered the goats to attack them.
events.significance: Introduction of Zenny, the central character of the Goat Island Arc and the island's only human inhabitant.

events.title: Zenny's Fatal Diagnosis
events.description: Chopper examines Zenny and discovers that due to his bad heart condition, Zenny probably only has three days to live. This revelation changes the crew's perspective on their stay on the island.
events.significance: Major plot point that motivates the crew to help Zenny fulfill his dreams before he dies, establishing the emotional core of the arc.

events.title: Discovery of the Mountain Pirate Ship
events.description: While hunting for food, Zoro discovers a strange pirate ship located in the mountains. He returns in the evening with fruits as food and tells the rest of the crew about his discovery.
events.significance: Introduces the mystery of the pirate ship in the mountains, which becomes central to the arc's plot and hints at Zenny's past.

events.title: Investigation of the Pirate Ship
events.description: The entire crew goes to investigate the mysterious pirate ship that Zoro found in the mountains, hoping to uncover its secrets and possible treasure.
events.significance: Sets up the mystery and treasure hunt elements that will continue throughout the arc.

quotes.text: We need to find food on this island or we're going to starve!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: The crew arrives on Goat Island desperately hungry

quotes.text: Someone ordered these goats to attack us!
quotes.speaker: Chopper
quotes.context: Chopper communicates with the goats and discovers they're following orders

quotes.text: Based on his heart condition, he probably only has three days to live.
quotes.speaker: Chopper
quotes.context: Chopper's diagnosis of Zenny's critical health condition

quotes.text: I found a strange pirate ship in the mountains!
quotes.speaker: Zoro
quotes.context: Zoro reveals his discovery to the crew

themes.description: The episode introduces Zenny's terminal condition, establishing themes about making the most of limited time and fulfilling dreams before it's too late.
themes.symbolism: The pirate ship in the mountains represents Zenny's unfulfilled dream of becoming a pirate.

themes.description: Despite being in a hurry and low on supplies, the Straw Hats decide to stay and help Zenny when they learn about his condition.
themes.symbolism: The crew's willingness to help a stranger reflects their core values of compassion and friendship.

characterSpotlights.development: Chopper demonstrates his medical expertise by diagnosing Zenny's condition and shows his unique ability to communicate with the island's goats.
keyActions: Communicates with the goats to understand their behavior
Examines Zenny and diagnoses his terminal heart condition
Delivers the difficult news about Zenny's prognosis
quotes: Someone ordered these goats to attack us!
Based on his heart condition, he probably only has three days to live.

characterSpotlights.role: Island inhabitant and former money lender
characterSpotlights.development: Introduced as a mysterious old man living alone with goats, revealed to be terminally ill with a heart condition.
keyActions: Commands the goats to attack the Straw Hats
Falls out of tree during introduction

characterSpotlights.development: Zoro's exploration of the island leads to the discovery of the mysterious pirate ship, advancing the plot.
keyActions: Discovers the pirate ship in the mountains
Returns with fruits and information about the ship
quotes: I found a strange pirate ship in the mountains!

characterSpotlights.development: Nami's quick thinking with the fog allows the crew to escape the Marines and reach Goat Island.
keyActions: Spots the fog and devises escape strategy
Navigates through dangerous rocks and fog
Stops the crew from eating the young goat

mangaDifferences.difference: This entire episode is filler and does not appear in the manga. The Goat Island Arc is anime-original content created to give the manga time to get ahead.

trivia.fact: This is the first episode of the Goat Island Arc, which spans episodes 136-138 and is the third filler arc in the One Piece anime.

sources.title: Goat Island Arc - One Piece Wiki

trivia.fact: Zenny is voiced by Osamu Saka in Japanese, a veteran voice actor who has worked on anime since the 1960s.
The Goat Island Arc was skipped entirely in the 4Kids English dub, making it one of several filler arcs that never aired in that version.
Episode 136 aired on December 8, 2002 in Japan, during the same period when the manga was in the Skypiea Arc (around Chapter 250).
Despite Chopper's diagnosis that Zenny has only three days to live, the character demonstrates remarkable vitality and survives well beyond the prognosis.
